TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MetadataWorkspace extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 ADO.NET 中繼資料執行階段服務元件，支援從不同的來源擷取中繼資料。

span.span: Represents the ADO.NET metadata runtime service component that provides support for retrieving metadata from various sources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供可用來與指定的應用程式的內容中的概念模型中繼資料互動的中央執行階段服務元件。The class provides a central runtime service component that you can use to interact with conceptual model metadata in the context of a given application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[中繼資料工作空間](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/601aee56-3eda-4caa-9082-a01df76c5e84)。For more information, see [Metadata Workspace](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/601aee56-3eda-4caa-9082-a01df76c5e84).
